alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:19PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT TUCKER AND SOUTH CENTRAL PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Parsons, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Davis, Thomas, Hendricks, Hambleton, Benbush, Elk, Lead Mine, Canaan Valley State Park, Pheasant Run, Blackwater Falls, Davisville, Cortland, Saint George, Red Creek, and Canaan Hgts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker
